link.label: IBM InfoSphere Data Architect components for Pack for SAP Applications product overview
link.text: Welcome to Version 8.0.0.1 of the IBM InfoSphere Data Architect components for Pack for SAP Applications. This new offering is the next generation integration of SAP and InfoSphere Information Server. It provides an all-new set of tools which will help you integrate SAP data within your enterprise faster, easier, and metadata-driven.

link.label: Introduction to Rapid Modeler for SAP Applications
link.text: This tool let's you browse and select SAP metadata to be imported into a logical data model created with InfoSphere Data Architect. Once the metadata is imported, you can create diagrams from it and add comments and annotations to better understand it.

link.label: Introduction to Rapid Generator for SAP Applications
link.text: After you have imported SAP metadata with the Rapid Modeler for SAP Applications, this component lets you generate jobs of InfoSphere DataStage. Those jobs, in turn, will extract or load the actual data to / from a relational database or flat files.
